scripts: var _paq = window._paq || [];  _paq.push(['setDocumentTitle', document.domain + '/' + document.title]);  _paq.push(['setCookieDomain', '*.cityvizor.cz']);  _paq.push(['setDomains', ['*.cityvizor.cz']]);  _paq.push(['trackPageView']);  _paq.push(['enableLinkTracking']);  (function() {    var u='//navstevnost.otevrenamesta.cz/';    _paq.push(['setTrackerUrl', u+'matomo.php']);    _paq.push(['setSiteId', '3']);    var d=document, g=d.createElement('script'), s=d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];    g.type='text/javascript'; g.async=true; g.defer=true; g.src=u+'matomo.js'; s.parentNode.insertBefore(g,s);  })();
